doc:
Peggy Pope https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peggy_Pope 0 Peggy Pope (born May 15, 1929) is an American actress. She was born in Montclair, New Jersey. She has made her many acting appearances beginning in 1966 with the television show The Trials of O'Brien, starring Peter Falk and Elaine Stritch. Pope is most recognizable as "the office lush", and later, recovered alcoholic, Margaret Foster in the 1980 movie 9 to 5 starring Dolly Parton, Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, and Dabney Coleman. She also had a small role as Elvira in the 1984 science fiction movie The Last Starfighter. A year later, she appeared in Once Bitten as Mark Kendall's mother. In 2008 she appeared as Sister Angela in Clark Gregg's Choke. She appeared in the rotating cast of the Off-Broadway staged reading of Wit Wisdom.Pope won an Obie Award for Best Actress in 1968 for her performance in Muzeeka. She has guest starred on numerous television series, including Bewitched, Hart to Hart, Eight is Enough, Barney Miller (in 6 episodes), Soap, The Golden Girls, Hope Faith and Law Order. Peggy_Pope ( born May_15_,_1929 ) is an_American_actress . She was_born in Montclair , New_Jersey . She has_made her_many_acting_appearances beginning in 1966 with the_television_show The_Trials of O'Brien , starring Peter_Falk and Elaine_Stritch . She also had a_small_role as Elvira in the_1984_science_fiction_movie The_Last_Starfighter . A_year later , she appeared in Once Bitten as Mark_Kendall 's_mother . In 2008 she appeared as Sister_Angela in Clark_Gregg 's_Choke . She appeared in the_rotating_cast of the_Off-Broadway staged reading of Wit_ won an_Obie_Award for_Best_Actress in 1968 for her_performance in Muzeeka . She has guest starred on numerous_television_series , including Bewitched , Hart to Hart , Eight is Enough , Barney_Miller_( in 6_episodes_)_,_Soap , The_Golden_Girls , Hope_ and Law_ .
